title.rendered: How To Do Keywords Analysis For Your Website?

content.rendered:
Keywords are like magnets and if your magnets are not that attractive then you cannot attract more traffic to your site. The importance of the keywords is very well known by all of digital marketers, SEO analysts or small online business owners. Almost everybody knows that keywords are used to get more traffic organically from search engine result pages (SERPs). But very few people know how to do keyword analysis or keyword research. 

A keyword analysis is conducted to get the appropriate and useful keywords for your SEO services. Keywords are not only useful in on-page or off-page SEO. But keywords are useful for anything related to online business or marketing. From social media to advertising campaigns, you can get keywords for everything. Every piece of content that you write on your blog or website, should have proper usage of keywords in it. Here in this post we will let you know everything related to keywords and its research. Also, we will let you know how you can do keyword research. 

Table of Contents

Toggle
  • More About Keyword
    • What Is A Keyword?
    • What Is Keyword Research?
    • Importance Of Keyword Research
  • Steps To Follow For Keyword Research
    • #1. Choose Your Topics
    • #2. Find A Keyword Research Tool
    • #3. Get Help From SERPs
    • #4. Analyze & Compare Metrics
    • #5. Choose Perfect Keywords
  • Important Things To Consider About Keywords
    • #1. Reach & Engagement
    • #2. Target Audience & Location
    • #3. Volume Of Searches
    • #4. Conversion Rate
    • #5. CPC

More About Keyword

The first thing that we all need to understand is the keyword. What a keyword is? There are many definitions of keywords online. Here we have explained everything to you in a very different manner. So let’s have a look at it. 

What Is A Keyword?

According to us, a keyword is a magnet that attracts more visitors to your website. On the other side if we talk generally about keywords. Then it is a word or term which is searched on the internet to find relevant things. There are different types of keywords out there. Some keywords are location specific while some others have call to action in them. Some keywords are primary while others are secondary keywords. 

Also, Read: How To Check SEO Health Of Your Website

What Is Keyword Research?

As its name states very clearly that when you are researching on or for keywords, it is known as keyword analysis. But why should one research keywords? Keep in mind that we are not talking about the keyword search. Here we are talking about keyword research which is completely a different thing. In this, a team of keyword researchers and experts work together on some specific keywords. They research more on keywords to get more details about it. 

Importance Of Keyword Research

As we have mentioned, when we are researching keywords, we get more information about it. The first thing is to search for some keywords relevant to your topics or business. But the issue here is that there are thousands of keywords and their variations on a similar topic. So how will you get to know which keyword is really useful for you? That is why keyword research is important. An SEO analyst or a keyword analysis team researches some keywords and topics. They try to find out metrics about the keywords. After that, the keyword report is compared and analyzed to figure out which one is the perfect keyword for your business. 

Steps To Follow For Keyword Research

We hope that you have a better idea about keywords and its research now. So now it is the right time to start working on keyword research. But do you know how to do keyword research? Well, here we are with the basic steps. Following these steps, you can easily do keyword research for your online business. No matter what type of business you have online. 

#1. Choose Your Topics

The first thing you have to consider is to choose your topics. There are many topics on the internet and inside them there are sub categories and sub-topics. So if you are not completely aware about the topics that you need, then you cannot conduct the keyword research for you. So you must follow this first step. 

#2. Find A Keyword Research Tool

The next step is to find a keyword research tool for you. You will need a very professional and deep research tool. There are many tools available on the internet and we are not going to recommend any keyword research tool to you. Because various tools have various pros and cons. So it is all up to you which tool you choose for you. 

#3. Get Help From SERPs

The next step is to get help from search engine result pages. However, we are not saying that this is a compulsory step. Also, most of the digital marketers miss this point while doing keyword research for their clients. But you will find so many keyword ideas at the bottom of the search engine result pages. 

#4. Analyze & Compare Metrics

Next step is to analyze and compare metrics that you have collected while researching a tool. In your keyword research tool or SEO tool, you will find a lot of metrics. Don’t worry if you know nothing about these metrics and their importance. Because we will tell you about them at the end. 

#5. Choose Perfect Keywords

Now after comparing and analyzing keywords with the help of tools, you will get a short list of keywords in front. According to the volume and other metrics you must choose the perfect keyword for your campaign. There will be some primary and some secondary keywords to use.

Also, Read: How To Do Competitive Analysis

Important Things To Consider About Keywords

Now you know the process to do keyword research. But the problem is that you don’t know the metrics and some other important things related to keywords. Then don’t worry, the following are the important factors that you must have to consider. 

#1. Reach & Engagement

The first thing that you will have to check while choosing a keyword is the reach and engagement of that keyword. If it doesn’t have any reach and engagement then it won’t be good for you to choose that keyword. 

#2. Target Audience & Location

Some keywords or groups of keywords target specific locations and specific audiences. If you are also looking for such keywords, then you must have to consider location and audience metrics while choosing keywords for your SEO campaign.

#3. Volume Of Searches

Volume is the most important factor that you have to see while choosing keywords or conducting keyword research. You must have to choose a keyword with a high volume of searches. Because such keywords will give you huge reach and engagement. You can target a large number of people through such keywords. 

#4. Conversion Rate

Conversion rate is also an important factor to check if you are conducting keyword research for lead generation. Because you need to target your leads and if there is low conversion rate then you will find difficulties to get more sales through your promotional campaign. 

#5. CPC

The above conversion rate is related to the organic targeting that you do through SEO and keywords. But let’s talk about the paid advertising or PPC campaigns. You must check the cost-per-click amount on an average basis for the keywords that you are going to target in your advertising campaign. 

Keywords research is important and it is easy also if you know the whole process and you have all the resources and tools that you need to conduct research. Without tools, you cannot do anything. So the first thing is the required tools and the second thing is planning. You must have a plan in which you should set your goals. After that start doing keyword research and use keywords in your SEO packages plan, PPC campaign or anywhere.

For any queries, Connect with EZ Rankings – SEO Company in India!
